results.definition: act or preside as chair, as of an academic department in a university
examples: She chaired the department for many years

results.definition: the officer who presides at the meetings of an organization
examples: address your remarks to the chairperson

results.definition: an instrument of execution by electrocution; resembles an ordinary seat for one person
examples: the murderer was sentenced to die in the chair
he was awarded an endowed chair in economics

results.definition: a particular seat in an orchestra
a seat for one person, with a support for the back
examples: he put his coat over the back of the chair and sat down
